overview: Traveling north into Arizona, Cisco finds that someone committing robberies has been impersonating him and he is a wanted man. After retrieving some of the stolen loot, he is caught with it in his posession and put in the guard house. A friend whose life he recently saved beaks him out and Cisco heads out to find the impersonator and clear himself.
tagline: The West's Fiercest Outlaws Gasped At His Daring...But The Senoritas All Gasped At His Loving!
title: King of the Bandits
